title: (x) Active Financial logo - Helvetica, Frutiger {Steven Wulf, Tiff}
content:
Hi!

Could someone tell me the font used in this logo please? Much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110530070815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/active_3566.jpg)
author: maffp

comments.content:
above is Helvetica Bold Oblique  
and below Frutiger Condensed i think!??!
I think it is Helvetica Black and they manually skewed it.
